While the conversation is still going on here, there have been a few PRs to Gazebo:

Pull request Description Approach Status
2220 Clean up world and physics engine pointers for a world without entities. Also make sure publishers, subscribers and topics for that world are gone. "Destructors -> Fini" trick merged into gazebo7 and forward to default
2257 Refactor memory management for Wind and Atmosphere. World keeps unique_ptr of Wind and Atmosphere, shares their raw pointers. Wind and Atmosphere keep raw pointer to World. merged into default
2263 Clean up model, link and light pointers. "Destructors -> Fini" trick merged into gazebo7 and forward to default
